str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From ek and homologeo; to acknowledge or agree fully.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To bring back word, report; I announce, declare. From ana and the base of aggelos; to announce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From prasso; practice, i.e. an act; by extension, a function.
